Instalace¶

Modul je k dispozici na PYPI repozitáři.

pip edeposit.amqp.aleph

*** Variables ***
${PACKAGE_NAME}   edeposit.amqp.aleph
${PACKAGE_URL}    https://pypi.python.org/pypi/${PACKAGE_NAME}/

PYPI repozitář¶

GET  ${PACKAGE_URL}
Response Status Code Should Equal  200
